website_summaries.verdict: An old fashioned clockwork metronome that requires winding. A basic, student-friendly device.
pros: Reliable clockwork mechanism with a sufficient tempo range
cons: Volume may not be high enough for ensemble work

customer_reviews.title: Loooooove it
customer_reviews.text: Best metronome ever. Perfect time, sound, look, everything. Also totally got some action after I gave it to my bf as a birthday present. Wins all around.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Works well and looks good
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a classic Metronome, you have found it here. Doesn't have all of the features that the newer electronic metronomes have, but if a mechanical metronome was good enough for Beethoven, it is good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dtouan

customer_reviews.title: This isn’t a real wood metronome, but a good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but I didn’t realize it wasn’t real wood until I bought it. It’s quieter than a wood metronome. I’m assuming the plastic body doesn’t let it resonate. Otherwise I’m good with it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Classic, nice looking, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Classic look. Only wish the hard plastic feet had rubber tips so not harsh-feeling on the piano.
customer_reviews.author: PDX mom

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for sister who is accomplished pianist. She likes it
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive with good internal mechanism. Works like they say it will
customer_reviews.author: raptor 1

customer_reviews.title: It worked
customer_reviews.text: Very light. Worked well with no issues. Just think price is too high for quality but will keep. Wood ones are way to expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift to my daughter. She loves it. Loud enough to hear while playing.
customer_reviews.author: cbredin

customer_reviews.title: Great metronome! Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Great metronome! Beautiful. Door is difficult to put back on properly as it is slightly warped but this does not affect its function.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not at all like the picture
customer_reviews.text: I knew this was not real wood, but based upon the description and some (not all) reviews I expected it to look much better.
customer_reviews.author: G. A. Hinnant

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this metronome. It really does and performs as expected. Also, it looks very nice!
customer_reviews.author: cijgr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the old-fashioned metronomes - they are visual as well as aural!
customer_reviews.author: Hip

customer_reviews.title: Metranome
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife. It is of good quality and appearance.
customer_reviews.author: bubbaprez

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: This was given to me as a gift to be a replacement for my 30+ old, and similar, Wittner which stopped working properly. Upon opening and holding it, 2 words came to mind; flimsy and cheap. Having experienced same with other products, this led me to believe it was also cheaply constructed and would not last long. For $55, the quality of this device should be significantly better. It was returned and a much better competitor's metronome was purchased at almost half the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Boo

customer_reviews.title: faux means fake.  Its plastic.
customer_reviews.text: I would have totally loved it, if not for the fact that the body is plastic. I desired real wood.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Hut

customer_reviews.title: It is loud.
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted one of real wood, but this one was very much like the old wooden ones. Also, it is loud and harsh.
customer_reviews.author: D.W.King

product_meta.title: Wittner 845111KA Faux Mahogany
product_meta.description: Color:Mahogany GrainWITTNER Metronome System Maelzel. Color: Mahogany Grain. Mat Silk. Without Bell. In Plastic Case. Dimension (H x W x D) 8.66x4.13x4.13inches (22x10.5x10.5cm). Weight: 13.40OZ (380g).
